A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The first time I felt like I could connect to a Star Wars film. I was horribly disappointed with Rogue One and this made up for it. Visually stunning\, wonderful character development\, and steller performances made this one stand out. We will be hearing complaints from disappointed fans who were raised on the prequel trilogy for a long time though. Because this film does away with all the things that make Jedi special and nessary. Thank god.
